name: rutty

If ground is rutty, it is full of deep, narrow marks, especially marks made by a wheel: The fields could only be crossed through rough and rutty wagon tracks. The track had been softened by the rain and quickly became rutty. Synonym
ruttedRelated word
rut
More examplesFewer examplesShe drives her car to work on rutty dirt roads.Heavy use had turned the track into a rutty mess filled with potholes.The track is fine for walking, but it is too rough and rutty for cars.We took a rocky, rutty road through the mountains.
